title: Exquisite Polki & Pink Tourmaline Raani Haar
materials: meticulously crafted with uncut Polki diamonds and captivating Pink Tourmalines. Features a central Emerald. Crafted with Hyderabadi polish for a lustrous finish.
features: This Raani Haar features a classic symmetrical design with a contemporary twist. The intricate Polki setting enhances the natural brilliance of the diamonds. The floral motifs are characteristic of South Indian jewelry design. Large, cushion-cut Tourmalines add a vibrant pop of color. Emerald is in the center. Features pear-shaped dangling accents, completing the regal look.
colors: White (Polki Diamonds). A harmonious blend of traditional hues.
occasions: and grand celebrations. A statement piece for brides during their Muhurtham or Seemantham ceremonies. Also suitable for elegant galas and special occasions.
description: A timeless blend of tradition and luxury, this Raani Haar showcases exquisite craftsmanship and high-quality gemstones. The uncut Polki diamonds have natural imperfections that make each piece uniquely special. The classic Raani Haar style is a valuable heirloom to pass down through generations. A stunning piece that commands attention and exudes sophistication.
